mapper.select: SELECT e.* FROM operate a INNER JOIN permission_operate b ON a.`operate_id`=b.`operate_id` INNER JOIN permission c ON b.`permission_id`= c.`permission_id` INNER JOIN role_permission d ON c.`permission_id`= d.`permission_id` INNER JOIN role e ON d.`role_id`=e.`role_id` WHERE a.`operate_url` =#{operate_url}
